resources.string: Dietica
Let’s start a healthier life one scan at a time. Understand your meals, plan your habits, and manage your activity in one click!
Let us know your name! Don’t forget your password!
253336274684-2u4c7u979beoo64cca707lsnpb2pq0ta.apps.googleusercontent.com

Welcome to Dietica, a health app designed to support you in achieving your personal health and wellness goals. By using Dietica, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
By downloading, accessing, or using Dietica, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, you must not use the App.

Dietica is a health and wellness app that uses generative AI technology to provide personalized suggestions, tips, and resources for users to help achieve health and fitness goals. The App’s content is intended for informational purposes only and should not replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
Dietica is intended for individuals aged 18 and over. If you are under 18, you must have permission from a parent or guardian to use the App.

Not Medical Advice: Dietica does not provide medical or clinical advice. The content and suggestions are based on general health principles and user-provided information. Always consult a qualified healthcare professional before making changes to your diet, exercise, or wellness routine.

Limitations: The generative AI suggestions provided by Dietica are based on algorithms analyzing user inputs and available health data. AI-generated suggestions may not be perfect or applicable to all users. Personalization: Dietica uses AI to tailor suggestions to your goals and preferences; however, results may vary based on individual responses, and you are encouraged to monitor and adjust based on personal experience.

Dietica is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and safeguard your personal information when you use our health and wellness app, Dietica. By using Dietica, you consent to the data practices described in this Privacy Policy.

To provide personalized recommendations and improve your experience, Dietica collects the following types of information: a. Personal Information We may collect personally identifiable information, such as your: Name Email address Age Height, weight, and other health metrics b. Health and Fitness Information When you use Dietica, you may provide health and fitness-related information, such as: Diet preferences Exercise habits Weight loss or fitness goals Medical history (if relevant and voluntarily provided) c. Device and Usage Information We may automatically collect certain information when you access or use the App, including: Device information (e.g., device type, operating system) IP address Usage data (e.g., features used, time spent on the App) App activity logs and interaction patterns d. Location Information With your consent, we may collect approximate location data to personalize recommendations based on your location.

Dietica uses the information we collect for the following purposes: Personalization: To tailor the App’s suggestions and content to meet your health and wellness goals. Health Recommendations: To provide generative AI-driven health, fitness, and dietary recommendations. Customer Support: To respond to your inquiries, troubleshoot issues, and improve your experience. App Improvement: To analyze user behavior and feedback to enhance our App’s functionality, content, and design. Compliance and Legal Obligations: To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and protect our legal rights.

Dietica does not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following situations: Service Providers: We may engage third-party vendors to provide services on our behalf (e.g., cloud storage, analytics) with access only to information necessary to perform their tasks. Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required by law, such as to comply with a subpoena, legal process, or government request. Business Transfers: If Dietica undergoes a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.
Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

You agree not to: Use the App for unlawful or prohibited activities. Provide false, misleading, or inaccurate information. Access or attempt to access the accounts of other users or violate their privacy.

All content provided by Dietica, including but not limited to text, images, and software, is the property of Dietica or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, distribute, or reproduce any part of the App without express permission.

License: Dietica grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the App solely for personal, non-commercial purposes. Restrictions: You may not modify, reverse-engineer, or attempt to extract the source code of the App.

Dietica may contain links to third-party websites, products, or services. These links are provided for convenience, and Dietica does not endorse or assume responsibility for any third-party content or practices.

Dietica is provided on an as-is and as-available basis. Dietica makes no warranties, expressed or implied, regarding the App’s performance, reliability, or accuracy. We do not guarantee that the App will be error-free, secure, or free from interruptions.

To the maximum extent permitted by law, Dietica and its affiliates, employees, and partners shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of data, revenue, or health outcomes.

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Dietica, its affiliates, employees, and partners from any claims, liabilities, damages, and expenses (including legal fees) arising from your use of the App or violation of these Terms.
